verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> and Song <WH7892> at the dedication <WH2598> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>. I will extol <WH7311> thee, O LORD <WH3068>; for thou hast lifted me up <WH1802>, and hast not made my foes <WH341> to rejoice <WH8055> over me.
O LORD <WH3068> my God <WH430>, I cried <WH7768> unto thee, and thou hast healed <WH7495> me.
O LORD <WH3068>, thou hast brought up <WH5927> my soul <WH5315> from the grave <WH7585>: thou hast kept me alive <WH2421>, that I should not go down <WH3381> <WH3381> to the pit <WH953>.
Sing <WH2167> unto the LORD <WH3068>, O ye saints <WH2623> of his, and give thanks <WH3034> at the remembrance <WH2143> of his holiness <WH6944>.

For his anger <WH639> endureth but a moment <WH7281>; in his favour <WH7522> is life <WH2416>: weeping <WH1065> may endure <WH3885> for a night <WH6153>, but joy <WH7440> cometh in the morning <WH1242>.
And in my prosperity <WH7959> I said <WH559>, I shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131>.
LORD <WH3068>, by thy favour <WH7522> thou hast made my mountain <WH2042> to stand <WH5975> strong <WH5797>: thou didst hide <WH5641> thy face <WH6440>, and I was troubled <WH926>.
I cried <WH7121> to thee, O LORD <WH3068>; and unto the LORD <WH3068> I made supplication <WH2603>.
What profit <WH1215> is there in my blood <WH1818>, when I go down <WH3381> to the pit <WH7845>? Shall the dust <WH6083> praise <WH3034> thee? shall it declare <WH5046> thy truth <WH571>?
Hear <WH8085>, O LORD <WH3068>, and have mercy <WH2603> upon me: LORD <WH3068>, be thou my helper <WH5826>.
Thou hast turned <WH2015> for me my mourning <WH4553> into dancing <WH4234>: thou hast put off <WH6605> my sackcloth <WH8242>, and girded <WH247> me with gladness <WH8057>;
To the end that my glory <WH3519> may sing <WH2167> praise to thee, and not be silent <WH1826>. O LORD <WH3068> my God <WH430>, I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee for ever <WH5769>.
